item.title: Adding stater? WDF!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Many pi’s have starter packages ip limits. You can only get two starter packs normally. Please make sure you are not listed under the packs as a receiver of a starter pack and respond back.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding stater? WDF!
item.dc:creator: @noobcoderh2o noobcoderh2o
item.description:
@noobcoderh2o wrote:

pi source
317

Ok so my current starter was an ip starter which i hated. So i removed everything with starter pre much. I just want a basic starter. Anyways so Heres what i just got so far * i couldnt find no starter tut*

public void addStarter() { c.getItems().addItem(995,10000000); c.getItems().addItem(6570,1); c.getItems().addItem(7061,250); c.getItems().addItem(1725,1); c.getItems().addItem(1704,1); c.getItems().addItem(7458,1); c.getItems().addItem(3105,1); c.getItems().addItem(1333,1); c.getItems().addItem(1323,1); c.getItems().addItem(3842,1); c.sendMessage("Please register on forums @ not up yet @"); c.sendMessage("If you drop any cash it will disappear for ever!"); c.sendMessage("Enjoy your stay on h2oscape"); c.getPA().showInterface(3559); c.canChangeAppearance = true; }

Thats playerassist.

Thats all i have. And thats all i thought i needed. But w.e i guess not. Cause when i log on new account i dont receive anything
PLEASE HELP!

Read full topic
